name: Embroidered Khussa Slippers
desc: Traditional hand-embroidered khussa with soft leather lining. Perfect for festive or casual ethnic wear.

name: Velvet Indoor Slippers
desc: Soft maroon velvet slippers designed for indoor comfort. Slip-on style with padded soles for cozy wear.

name: Casual Flat Slide Slippers
desc: Minimalist nude slide slippers with faux leather straps. Great for everyday errands or summer hangouts.

name: Pearl Embellished Slippers
desc: Elegant slippers featuring pearl detailing on the strap. A classy addition to semi-formal outfits.

name: Fur Cross-Strap Slippers
desc: Plush pink fur slippers with cozy cross-strap design. Ideal for lounging in comfort and style.

name: Ethnic Mirror Work Slippers
desc: Colorful slippers with intricate mirror and thread work. A vibrant choice for traditional looks.

name: Quilted Slip-On Slippers
desc: Textured quilted design with cushioned insoles for added comfort. Easy to wear and matches everyday outfits.

name: Beaded T-Strap Flat Slippers
desc: Golden flat slippers with T-strap beaded detailing. Adds a festive vibe to summer evenings or parties.
